6783afddef9d6f5d579c43f1.Name: Mosin Nagant M1891/30 Bayonet
6783afddef9d6f5d579c43f1.Description: M1891/30 pattern bayonet used during WW2 by the Soviet Union. More effective against political prisoners than charging towards machine gun fire with.

6783b041281387d669fd3722.Name: M9 Bayonet Replica
6783b041281387d669fd3722.Description: Replica of the M9 Bayonet, a multi-purpose knife and bayonet officially adopted in 1986 by the United States.

6783b079e4585dfb0fec3c73.Name: 6Kh4 Bayonet
6783b079e4585dfb0fec3c73.Description: 6Kh4 bayonet for use with both AKM and AK-74 pattern assault rifles.

67a13809c3bc1e2fa47e6eec.Name: M53A1 Gas Mask
67a13809c3bc1e2fa47e6eec.Description: The M53A1 gas mask is an improved single filter port variant of the M5, a series of gas masks based on the M50 and specifically developed to meet the unique requirements of Special Operations Forces (SOF) operators.
